description: We've all been spending a lot more time in our gardens recently, the lockdown and good weather combined have seen us undertaking DIY projects inside and out of the house. A quick way to add a little bit of flair to your home is introducing botanicals. If you're looking for something a little bit quirky and out there, we'd check out big interior brands like MADE or...
text:
We've all been spending a lot more time in our gardens recently, the lockdown
and good weather combined have seen us undertaking DIY projects inside and out
of the house.

A quick way to add a little bit of flair to your home is introducing
botanicals. Whether it's fresh flowers, faux flowers or a bit of foliage,
greenery in the home instantly oozes fresh -how you style them in and out of
the home is part of the fun.

Plant pots come in different shapes, sizes and colours; depending on the look
you're going for in your space there are designs that will help to show off
your personality or add the creative flair to areas of the house. Adding them
to a smaller garden or balcony can create a nice atmosphere to relax in.

We found some great deals online at John Lewis with a lot of modern designs
available. If you're looking for something a little bit quirky and out there,
we'd check out big interior brands like MADE or Rockett St George.

We've rounded up some of the best options for your home below.

Best stylish plant pots for your home and garden

1\. Groot Plant Pot

Who doesn't want a little baby Groot in any form

The multi-functional planter can be used for decoration, as a pencil pot
holder or to grow small plants and flowers. It' made of durable PVC material
and features a small hole underneath, so extra water is able to make its way
out in time.

You could buy more than one and have a nursery of Groot's dotted around the
house with lovely plants inside.

Price: £8.98, Amazon - buy here now

2\. Sloth Flower Pots

This pack of two flower pots are in the shape of adorable sloths, they come in
a beige or grey tone and both feature a rope detail to hang them around the
home.

The ceramic pots are suitable for use with small plants, flowers or
botanicals.

Price: £10, Wish - buy here now

3\. Gablemere Greenhurst Antique Bronze Effect Planters

If you're looking for large pots to set the scene outdoors, these antique
bronze effect planters are ideal.

They look like metal but are actually made from a super durable polyurethane
material, which is weatherproof, lighter than metal and entirely maintenance
free.

Each planter features an integral drainage tray making each pot suitable for
indoor and outdoor use.

Price: £39.99, Amazon - buy here now

4\. Ivyline Indoor Plant Pot and Mimmo Stand

If you want to make a subtle statement in the home, this pot and stand set
from Ivyline, is the little bit of understated glamour every house needs.

The minimalist and modern design, will make a great accent in any home
regardless of the interior setting, they're also rust-resistant and suitable
for a variety of house plants, foliage or succulents.

Price: £34, John Lewis - buy here now

5\. Ariba Set of 2 Large Woven Plant Stands

Transform your outdoor space into a bold and colourful haven, with this set of
two woven stands.

Featuring a contrasting blue scheme, that is complimentary when greenery is
added. The large plant stands are crafted from polyrattan, which is durable,
weatherproof and lightweight -perfect for every outdoor space.

Price: £49, Made - buy here now

6\. Stjarnanis Flower Outdoor Box

If you'd like to display your greenery in a more traditional way, this outdoor
flower box from IKEA is durable and big enough to hold a nursery of all of
your favourites.

The sustainable box is made from ethically sourced solid wood, that will only
get better with age and a little rain.

Price: £27, IKEA \- buy here now

7\. Terracotta Flower Pot

Add a pop of colour to your space. This flower pot is made from 100%
terracotta and features a matching high-rim saucer and hole at the bottom to
collect excess water.

The glazed finish helps to prevent damp and the pots come in different colours
and sizes for you to mix and match.

Price: £25, Arket - buy here now

8\. Umbra Bolo Hanging Planter

Hanging planters are ll the rage now, especially for those that are pushed for
space, or just prefer to display their plants and succulents in a unique way.

The Bolo ceramic pot from Umbra is suspended by a matching rope design with
modern curved metals and chic brass finishes.

It's easily mounted to your wall or ceiling with matching hooks and fittings.

Price: £40, John Lewis - buy here now

9\. Ceramic Jungle Head Vase

Add a dash of quirk to your home with these Jungle Head vases.

These cool accents are a fun way to add botanical touches inside the home and
a perfect for small plants, succulents and more. Even if you decide against
filling them, they're still pretty cool as decorative accents.

Price: £36, Not on the High Street \- buy here now

10\. Wooden Plant Pot

This wooden plant pot is made from 100% mango wood, making it a sustainable
option that will bring an earthy tone to the house.

Mix and match with other earthy tones or accents of gold to bring the wooden
texture alive.

Price: £17.99, H&M - buy here now

For more ways to stay comfortable in you garden, check out the best patio
heaters worth investing in for chillier evenings outside.

title: Best stylish plant pots to transform your home and garden
html:
We've all been spending a lot more time in our gardens recently, the lockdown and good weather combined have seen us undertaking DIY projects inside and out of the house.

A quick way to add a little bit of flair to your home is introducing botanicals. Whether it's fresh flowers, faux flowers or a bit of foliage, greenery in the home instantly oozes fresh -how you style them in and out of the home is part of the fun.

Plant pots come in different shapes, sizes and colours; depending on the look you're going for in your space there are designs that will help to show off your personality or add the creative flair to areas of the house. Adding them to a smaller garden or balcony can create a nice atmosphere to relax in.

We found some great deals online at John Lewis with a lot of modern designs available. If you're looking for something a little bit quirky and out there, we'd check out big interior brands like MADE or Rockett St George.

We've rounded up some of the best options for your home below.

Best stylish plant pots for your home and garden

1. Groot Plant Pot

Who doesn't want a little baby Groot in any form

The multi-functional planter can be used for decoration, as a pencil pot holder or to grow small plants and flowers. It' made of durable PVC material and features a small hole underneath, so extra water is able to make its way out in time.

You could buy more than one and have a nursery of Groot's dotted around the house with lovely plants inside.

Price: £8.98, Amazon - buy here now

2. Sloth Flower Pots

This pack of two flower pots are in the shape of adorable sloths, they come in a beige or grey tone and both feature a rope detail to hang them around the home.

The ceramic pots are suitable for use with small plants, flowers or botanicals.

Price: £10, Wish - buy here now

3. Gablemere Greenhurst Antique Bronze Effect Planters

If you're looking for large pots to set the scene outdoors, these antique bronze effect planters are ideal.

They look like metal but are actually made from a super durable polyurethane material, which is weatherproof, lighter than metal and entirely maintenance free.

Each planter features an integral drainage tray making each pot suitable for indoor and outdoor use.

Price: £39.99, Amazon - buy here now

4. Ivyline Indoor Plant Pot and Mimmo Stand

If you want to make a subtle statement in the home, this pot and stand set from Ivyline, is the little bit of understated glamour every house needs.

The minimalist and modern design, will make a great accent in any home regardless of the interior setting, they're also rust-resistant and suitable for a variety of house plants, foliage or succulents.

Price: £34, John Lewis - buy here now

5. Ariba Set of 2 Large Woven Plant Stands

Transform your outdoor space into a bold and colourful haven, with this set of two woven stands.

Featuring a contrasting blue scheme, that is complimentary when greenery is added. The large plant stands are crafted from polyrattan, which is durable, weatherproof and lightweight -perfect for every outdoor space.

Price: £49, Made - buy here now

6. Stjärnanis Flower Outdoor Box

If you'd like to display your greenery in a more traditional way, this outdoor flower box from IKEA is durable and big enough to hold a nursery of all of your favourites.

The sustainable box is made from ethically sourced solid wood, that will only get better with age and a little rain.

Price: £27, IKEA - buy here now

7. Terracotta Flower Pot

Add a pop of colour to your space. This flower pot is made from 100% terracotta and features a matching high-rim saucer and hole at the bottom to collect excess water.

The glazed finish helps to prevent damp and the pots come in different colours and sizes for you to mix and match.

Price: £25, Arket - buy here now

8. Umbra Bolo Hanging Planter

Hanging planters are ll the rage now, especially for those that are pushed for space, or just prefer to display their plants and succulents in a unique way.

The Bolo ceramic pot from Umbra is suspended by a matching rope design with modern curved metals and chic brass finishes.

It's easily mounted to your wall or ceiling with matching hooks and fittings.

Price: £40, John Lewis - buy here now

9. Ceramic Jungle Head Vase

Add a dash of quirk to your home with these Jungle Head vases.

These cool accents are a fun way to add botanical touches inside the home and a perfect for small plants, succulents and more. Even if you decide against filling them, they're still pretty cool as decorative accents.

Price: £36, Not on the High Street - buy here now

10. Wooden Plant Pot

This wooden plant pot is made from 100% mango wood, making it a sustainable option that will bring an earthy tone to the house.

Mix and match with other earthy tones or accents of gold to bring the wooden texture alive.

Price: £17.99, H&M - buy here now
